title: C64 EmuXtras
description:
C64 Xtras Collection 0.8 for Xbox1


This pack consists of :

- 4295 C64 Titles ;  'Handpicked' , tested, and the best and / or latest versions from groups like Nostalgia and Remember.
  All Renamed & Unzipped (so highscores will work). Game Images were changed when needed with extras or extra versions of a game for example. 
- Previews
- Scene-Demo Selection


- Boxart in High quality ; Remastered and Retouched (A lot of work has gone into this, quite some Boxart is very old and / or obscure and very hard to find. The end result is quite nice , especially on HD!)
- Newly made Action and Title shots. (Excisting ones were often in the wrong colours, missing borders or very simply very boring to look at).
- Manuals & Maps
- Game Info

- Game configurations!  All games will load out-of-the-box , no messing around with drive settings etc.   
  All games have their own unique controller settings!  So 'Cybernoid' will have weapons mapped under the controller, 'Renegade' won't need the keyboard anymore etc.
  Ofcourse heavy RPG's and teks adventures will need an (xbox) keyboard. However certain RPGs or Arcade-FlightSims like 'Ace 2' or 'Infiltrator' DO have mappings!



This is a complete Out-of-the-Box Commodore 64 experience on Xbox! With all configurations etc. there is nothing like this on ANY system as far as I know.
